title: Britain's Got Talent
content:
Hi,

Anyone know what font is used in the 'Britains Got Talent' logo?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141107175030im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bgt2_3726.jpg)
author: ostorey

comments.content: thanks! and for the britains got?
thanks! and for the britains got?
oops! i didnt mean to post this twice - sorry!

See [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20141107175030/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=194275): Big Noodle Titling by Sentinel Type. Don't know if that is the origin.
